issue.title: Change labels of diffusion 'state' (published)
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

The diffusion object has it's state set on screen by joomla defaults string: "state" -> "published"/"unpublished".
This introduce confusion with metadata state 'published' and the publishing process.

We propose to change it to "Diffusion enabled" -> "yes"/"no" (FR: Diffusion active -> Oui/Non) and use easysdi strings (overridable).

**Fixed versions :** 4.5.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Can it be accepted, then affected to me ? thx Hélène !
